title.narrative: Multipurpose Drinking water and irrigation program for the municipalities of Batallas, Pucarani and El Alto

description.narrative: Improve potable water service delivery in El Alto and access to water in Pucarani and Batallas, taking into account climate change resilience considerations

participating-org.narrative: Inter-American Development Bank, Inter-American Investment Corporation and Multilateral Investment Fund

activity-date.narrative: Planned start date of the activity

mailing-address.narrative: The World Bank, 1818 H Street, NW, Washington, DC 20433 USA
